name: pudl-msha
title: US MSHA Mines and Production
description:
This data package contains data published by the US Mining Safety and Health Administration (MSHA). This version focuses on datasets relevant to coal production and the US electricity sector (the mines themselves, their production and employment histories, the entities operating the mines, etc.). Subsequent versions will hopefully integrate additional resources published by MSHA.

This data was packaged for easy re-use by [Catalyst Cooperative](https://catalyst.coop) as part of the [Public Utility Data Liberation (PUDL)](https://github.com/catalyst-cooperative/pudl) project.
